entry.title: Kazakhstan timezone changes (Mar 1, 2024) are not reflected in Intl.DateTimeFormat (IANA 2024a)
entry.content:
# Steps to reproduce the problem console.log( new Intl.DateTimeFormat('en-GB', { dateStyle: 'full', timeStyle: 'long', timeZone: 'Asia/Almaty', }).format(new Date(Date.UTC(2024, 2, 1, 10, 0, 0, 0))), );
# Problem Description Kazakhstan will utilize single UTC+5 timezone https://www.timeanddate.com/news/time/kazakhstan-single-time-zone.html from March 1, 2024. The code above shows the UTC+6, which is incorrect. It should be UTC+5. It seems that latest changes of IANA 2024a are not applied.
# Additional Comments The timezone is correct in Firefox 124.0b3 and Safari 17.2.1
# Summary Kazakhstan timezone changes (Mar 1, 2024) are not reflected in Intl.DateTimeFormat (IANA 2024a)
# Custom Questions #### Which component does this fall under? Not sure - I don't know
#### Does this work in other browsers? Yes - This is just a Chrome problem
# Additional Data Category: API \ Chrome Channel: Canary \ Regression: N/A

entry.title: Tab focuses on Invite though there is no functionality for it in Google Meet
entry.content:
Chrome Version: 124.0.6329.0 (Official Build) canary (arm64) 8f83baf3936696a32b20875d9436b4829c44765b-refs/branch-heads/6329@{#1}
OS : Mac,Win(10,11),Linux
Preconditions: None
Steps to reproduce: 1. Launch Chrome and create any instant meet 2. Click on Add others 3. Tab focus in the pop-up that appears 4. Observe that tab focuses on Invite though it has no functionality either by hitting enter or clicking on it.
Actual Result: Tab focuses on Invite though it has no functionality
Expected Result: There must be no tab focus on Invite when it has no functionality
This issue exists from M-112 onwards .So, raising it as a NR issue.
Please refer to the screencast below:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1CBMzthGa3lvM3CFWHQdgr6-snIxPrsux/view?usp=drive_link
Notes: 1)This issue able to repro on Beta #123.0.6312.4, Dev #124.0.6315.2 and Stable #122.0.6261.94 2)As this is a Non-Regression issue, changing the status to Untriaged so that the issue would get addressed.
Thanks..!!

entry.content:

OS : Mac,Win(10,11),Linux

Steps to reproduce: 1. Launch Chrome and set default search engine as bing from chrome://settings/search 2. Open NTP 3. Click on real box to show suggestions 4. Click on omnibox and type something 5. Observe

entry.title: Video frame quad is not opaque
entry.content:
We've enabled the hardware decoding on Linux Wayland with output format of AR24. However, the AR24 frame is marked as "not opaque" [1], causing we cannot promote it to overlays with the check here [2].
I think the Alpha channel should not be really used as we have opacity and blend mode in quad state to handle cases we need blending. So maybe video frames should be always opaque here [1]?
[1] https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:third_party/blink/renderer/platform/graphics/video_frame_submitter.cc;l=836
[2] https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/main:components/viz/service/display/overlay_strategy_fullscreen.cc;l=52

entry.title: Regression: Crash is observed when click on Exit button in Guest profile
entry.content:
Chrome Version: M123 Dev #123.0.6312.11/15786.4.0 - Atlas(Poppy) and Redrix(Brya) devices
Lacros Version : LaCrOS Canary #124.0.6329.0
OS: Chrome
Issue Details: ------------------- 1)Accounts: Corp account 2)Enterprise Enrolled: yes, signed in with Corp account 3)Devices: A)Non-Corp devices Atlas(Poppy) - X86/Lacros64 Redrix(Brya)) - X86/Lacros64 4)Repro on Ash-chrome: Yes, able to repro on Ash 5)Mode: Verified 6)Frequency: Always 7)Enable the following flags from Ash Chrome (legacy) #lacros-stability = Canary #lacros-only = Enabled #lacros-availability-ignore = Enabled
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Launch Lacros browser 2. Enter into the device guest mode 3. Make sure Lacros is not seen in Guest profile 4. Click in the Guest button at top right corner and observe
What is the expected result? Browser should not crash
What happens instead? Instead after clicking on Guest button browser is getting crashed
Note: 1) Issue is seen when Lacros is not seen in Guest profile 2) This Issue Regression same working fine on M122 Beta #122.0.6261.84/15753.31.0 on Kano(Bryal) device 3) Crash id's are not generating for this crash

entry.content:
Chrome Version : 122.0.6261.71 OS Windows: 10
What steps will reproduce the problem? On load, the pretty print is active by default
What is the expected result? it should be disabled or an option in settings should be available to disable
What happens instead? please can it be disabled or allow me to disable it as this breaks my CSS formatting, there was an option to disable the automatic pretty print of code but this is infuriating. I constantly have to reformat my CSS, there are limitations on the bespoke CMS I use for my job in terms of how many lines of CSS I can have.

entry.title: Regression 121->122. Native messaging in manif v2 ext is unreliable if native app sends 30 000 bytes
PDF accessibility regression causing PDFExtensionAccessibilityTestWithOopifOverride test failures
entry.content:
these tests are failing due to https://crrev.com/1264786:
All/PDFExtensionAccessibilityTestWithOopifOverride.PdfAccessibilityContextMenuAction/0 All/PDFExtensionAccessibilityTestWithOopifOverride.PdfAccessibilityEnableLater/0 All/PDFExtensionAccessibilityTestWithOopifOverride.PdfAccessibilityEnableLater/1 All/PDFExtensionAccessibilityTestWithOopifOverride.PdfAccessibilitySelection/0
see https://ci.chromium.org/ui/p/chromium/builders/try/linux-rel/1721260/overview for examples.
`WaitForAccessibilityTreeToContainNodeWithName` is timing out on account of the browser never receiving the tree update containing the PDF's contents.
to repro, patch in https://crrev.com/c/5319178 (which fixes a different bug that was blocking these tests prior to r1264786) and run them. the tests pass with https://crrev.com/1264785 (the commit prior).

entry.title: Support Av1 encoding on Mac M3
entry.content: it looks like MacBooks with M3 chip support accelerated Av1 encoding. Chromium needs to use it.

entry.title: Certain pages will be unresponsive once opened in no-sandbox context
entry.content:
# Steps to reproduce the problem 1. docker pull crazyones110/vnc-setup 2. docker pull crazyones110/chrome-stable 3. docker network create mynetwork 4. docker run -d --network=mynetwork --name=myxvfb -p 5900:5900 --shm-size=1gb crazyones110/vnc-setup 5. docker run --network=mynetwork --shm-size=2gb crazyones110/chrome-stable 6. open any vnc-view and access localhost:5900
# Problem Description I attempted to use chrome in a docker environment along with another container with Xvfb and x11vnc installed. When open certain pages, the page will soon be unresponsive. While firefox is ok with those pages, so I consider it's not the bug related to inappropriate vnc setup
# Additional Comments The code is shown on dockerhub descriptions: https://hub.docker.com/r/crazyones110/vnc-setup https://hub.docker.com/r/crazyones110/chrome-stable
# Summary Certain pages will be unresponsive once opened in no-sandbox context
# Custom Questions #### How much crashed? Just one tab
#### Is it a problem with a plugin? No - It's the browser itself
# Additional Data Category: Crashes \ Chrome Channel: Stable \ Regression: N/A

entry.title: Drag icon error
entry.content: On Windows systems, the browser initially allows dragging and dropping a file from the desktop. Then make the browser non-dragable. At this time, drag the file from the desktop and you will find that the drag icon is still draggable and has not changed.

entry.title: When playing a video file and then playing another video file, the sound stops after about 50 second
entry.content:
# Steps to reproduce the problem 1. Enter the URL below and play for at least 5 seconds https://wstrssl.ebsmath.co.kr/ebsvod/ebsm/M42M2201/M202200009/M202200009_2000K_M00028.mp4 2. In the same window, enter the URL below to play it. https://wstrssl.ebsmath.co.kr/ebsvod/ebsm/M42M2201/M202200009/M202200009_2000K_M00001.mp4 3. After about 50 seconds, the sound cuts out, and playback stops after the media player freezes. This is happening after a recent browser update.
# Problem Description If you are playing a media server video file in a browser and view another video file in the same tabbed window, the media player starts to malfunction.
# Summary When playing a video file and then playing another video file, the sound stops after about 50 second
# Custom Questions #### Does this work in other browsers?
Yes - This is just a Chromium problem
# Additional Data Category: Audio / Video \ Chrome Channel: Stable \ Regression: N/A

entry.title: chrome://sync-internals: Offer some way to dump/save/export the traffic log
entry.content: Currently, chrome://sync-internals has a "Dump status" button which includes most info on the page, but not the traffic log. For some user investigations, it would be helpful to have a way of dumping the traffic log too.

entry.title: [Chromium GSoC] Request for details (bookmark)
entry.content:
I'm Ashish Soni, a Computer Science & Engineering student at IIIT Kota, I'm passionate about web development and open-source contributions. After my experience with The Tor Project during GSoC'23, I'm eager to contribute to the "Bring Tree View to Bookmark Side Panel" project for GSoC 2024.
I've reviewed the project slide & docs and have a few specific questions before I draft my proposal and send it to you.
**Question about Project**
1. Will I focus on UI design or more on implementation through coding or both during project?
2. How do we plan to implement the drag-to-rearrange feature? Any specific libraries or frameworks we are using currently, or this same functionality is present somewhere?
3. How about adding drag-to-arrange to Reading list as well, or should I just focus on Bookmark for now?
4. I'm curious about how the system deals when multiple folders might need to be marked as "active" at the same time eg: when users are interacting with different parts of the bookmarks tree across separate windows or tabs, how does it work? (I'm little confused here Can you provide some material to read, to understand this.)
Additionally, it would be greatly helpful if you could provide guidance on what steps to take next to understand the project.
Thank you for considering my questions. I look forward to your guidance & excited to work with you!

entry.title: Move CredManUiModeRecommender to chrome/
entry.content:
WebView does not require CredManUiModeRecommender. Move it one level up to simplify build deps.
See crbug.com/327157513 for more details.

entry.title: WebNN: Remove MLAutoPad
entry.content: WebNN spec removes MLAutoPad support: https://github.com/webmachinelearning/webnn/pull/587. Chromium implementation should align with that.

entry.title: "Always open these types of links in the associated app" doesn't work
entry.content:
# Steps to reproduce the problem 1. Open a website in incognito mode that will want to redirect to another website 2. Click the "Always allow ... to open links of this type" checkbox 3. Open the same website again - the checkbox popup will appear again
# Problem Description I run UI tests on a browser in incognito mode. The tests want to use a tool called "Soneta.helper". Every time I start the browser, the "Open Soneta.helper?" popup appears. I click the "Always allow ... to open links of this type" checkbox and these settings are not remembered. The next time I launch the browser, the popup appears again.
We tried adding URLAllowlist to the registry but it doesn't work either.
How can we solve the problem described above? Thank you in advance for your answer.
# Summary "Always open these types of links in the associated app" doesn't work
# Additional Data Category: Enterprise \ Chrome Channel: Not sure \ Regression: Yes

entry.title: Allow changing Headless' screen properties
entry.content:
Chrome's headless mode can be used to save resources while automating the browser for various purposes, among which is the testing of websites.
Right now, headless doesn't support any way to change screen properties like scale or color depth, so it is harder to test the effect of different values for these properties on our webpage. However, the code does have the ability to set custom parameters for these properties, all we need is to expose them for usage.
